tests.name: should trigger hover event

tests.name: should not trigger hover event because of the offset is beyond the element
tests.code: it('should not trigger hover event because of the offset is beyond the element', () => I.amOnPage('/form/hover').then(() => I.moveCursorTo('#hover', 100, 100)).then(() => I.dontSee('Hovered', '#show')));

tests.name: should only have 1 tab open when the browser starts and navigates to the first page
tests.code: it('should only have 1 tab open when the browser starts and navigates to the first page', () => I.amOnPage('/').then(() => I.wait(1)).then(() => I.grabNumberOfOpenTabs()).then(numPages => assert.equal(numPages, 1)));

tests.name: should switch to next tab
tests.code: it('should switch to next tab', () => I.amOnPage('/info').then(() => I.wait(1)).then(() => I.grabNumberOfOpenTabs()).then(numPages => assert.equal(numPages, 1)).then(() => I.click('New tab')).then(() => I.switchToNextTab()).then(() => I.wait(2)).then(() => I.seeCurrentUrlEquals('/login')).then(() => I.grabNumberOfOpenTabs()).then(numPages => assert.equal(numPages, 2)));

tests.name: should assert when there is no ability to switch to next tab
should close current tab
tests.code: it('should close current tab', () => I.amOnPage('/info').then(() => I.click('New tab')).then(() => I.switchToNextTab()).then(() => I.wait(2)).then(() => I.seeInCurrentUrl('/login')).then(() => I.grabNumberOfOpenTabs()).then(numPages => assert.equal(numPages, 2)).then(() => I.closeCurrentTab()).then(() => I.wait(1)).then(() => I.seeInCurrentUrl('/info')).then(() => I.grabNumberOfOpenTabs()).then(numPages => assert.equal(numPages, 1)));

tests.name: should close other tabs
tests.code: it('should close other tabs', () => I.amOnPage('/').then(() => I.openNewTab()).then(() => I.wait(1)).then(() => I.seeInCurrentUrl('about:blank')).then(() => I.amOnPage('/info')).then(() => I.openNewTab()).then(() => I.amOnPage('/login')).then(() => I.closeOtherTabs()).then(() => I.wait(1)).then(() => I.seeInCurrentUrl('/login')).then(() => I.grabNumberOfOpenTabs()).then(numPages => assert.equal(numPages, 1)));

tests.name: should open new tab
tests.code: it('should open new tab', () => I.amOnPage('/info').then(() => I.openNewTab()).then(() => I.wait(1)).then(() => I.seeInCurrentUrl('about:blank')).then(() => I.grabNumberOfOpenTabs()).then(numPages => assert.equal(numPages, 2)));

tests.name: should switch to previous tab
tests.code: it('should switch to previous tab', () => I.amOnPage('/info').then(() => I.openNewTab()).then(() => I.wait(1)).then(() => I.seeInCurrentUrl('about:blank')).then(() => I.switchToPreviousTab()).then(() => I.wait(2)).then(() => I.seeInCurrentUrl('/info')));

tests.name: should wait for expected value for given xpath locator

tests.code: it('should only wait for one of the matching elements to contain the value given xpath locator', () => I.amOnPage('/form/wait_value').then(() => I.waitForValue('//input[@type = "text"]', 'Brisbane', 4)).then(() => I.seeInField('#text', 'Brisbane')).then(() => I.seeInField('#text2', 'London')));

tests.name: Drag and drop from within an iframe
tests.code: xit('Drag and drop from within an iframe', () => I.amOnPage('https://jqueryui.com/droppable').then(() => I.resizeWindow(700, 700)).then(() => I.switchTo('//iframe[@class="demo-frame"]')).then(() => I.seeElementInDOM('#draggable')).then(() => I.dragAndDrop('#draggable', '#droppable')).then(() => I.see('Dropped')));

tests.name: should switch to frame using name
tests.code: it('should switch to frame using name', () => I.amOnPage('/iframe').then(() => I.see('Iframe test', 'h1')).then(() => I.dontSee('Information', 'h1')).then(() => I.switchTo('iframe')).then(() => I.see('Information', 'h1')).then(() => I.dontSee('Iframe test', 'h1')));

tests.name: should switch to root frame
tests.code: it('should switch to root frame', () => I.amOnPage('/iframe').then(() => I.see('Iframe test', 'h1')).then(() => I.dontSee('Information', 'h1')).then(() => I.switchTo('iframe')).then(() => I.see('Information', 'h1')).then(() => I.dontSee('Iframe test', 'h1')).then(() => I.switchTo()).then(() => I.see('Iframe test', 'h1')));

tests.name: should switch to frame using frame number
tests.code: it('should switch to frame using frame number', () => I.amOnPage('/iframe').then(() => I.see('Iframe test', 'h1')).then(() => I.dontSee('Information', 'h1')).then(() => I.switchTo(0)).then(() => I.see('Information', 'h1')).then(() => I.dontSee('Iframe test', 'h1')));

tests.code: it('should wait for input text field to be enabled by xpath', () => I.amOnPage('/form/wait_enabled').then(() => I.waitForEnabled("//*[@name = 'test']", 2)).then(() => I.fillField('#text', 'hello world')).then(() => I.seeInField('#text', 'hello world')));

tests.name: should wait for a button to be enabled
tests.code: it('should wait for a button to be enabled', () => I.amOnPage('/form/wait_enabled').then(() => I.waitForEnabled('#text', 2)).then(() => I.click('#button')).then(() => I.see('button was clicked', '#message')));

tests.name: should wait for text after load body
should wait for expected value for given locator
should wait for expected value for given css locator
tests.code: it('should wait for expected value for given css locator', () => I.amOnPage('/form/wait_value').then(() => I.seeInField('#text', 'Hamburg')).then(() => I.waitForValue('#text', 'Brisbane', 2.5)).then(() => I.seeInField('#text', 'Brisbane')));

tests.name: should wait for expected value for given xpath locator
tests.code: it('should wait for expected value for given xpath locator', () => I.amOnPage('/form/wait_value').then(() => I.seeInField('#text', 'Hamburg')).then(() => I.waitForValue('//input[@value = "Gre aus Hamburg"]', 'Brisbane', 2.5)).then(() => I.seeInField('#text', 'Brisbane')));

tests.name: should only wait for one of the matching elements to contain the value given xpath locator
tests.code: it('should only wait for one of the matching elements to contain the value given xpath locator', () => I.amOnPage('/form/wait_value').then(() => I.waitForValue('//input[@type = "text"]', 'Brisbane', 4)).then(() => I.seeInField('#text', 'Brisbane')).then(() => I.seeInField('#text2', 'London')));

tests.name: should only wait for one of the matching elements to contain the value given css locator
tests.code: it('should only wait for one of the matching elements to contain the value given css locator', () => I.amOnPage('/form/wait_value').then(() => I.waitForValue('.inputbox', 'Brisbane', 4)).then(() => I.seeInField('#text', 'Brisbane')).then(() => I.seeInField('#text2', 'London')));

tests.name: should grab inner html from an element using xpath query
tests.code: it('should grab inner html from an element using xpath query', () => I.amOnPage('/').then(() => I.grabHTMLFrom('//title')).then(html => assert.equal(html, 'TestEd Beta 2.0')));

tests.name: should grab inner html from an element using id query
tests.code: it('should grab inner html from an element using id query', () => I.amOnPage('/').then(() => I.grabHTMLFrom('#area1')).then(html => assert.equal(html.trim(), ' Test Link ')));

tests.name: should grab inner html from multiple elements
tests.code: it('should grab inner html from multiple elements', () => I.amOnPage('/').then(() => I.grabHTMLFromAll('//a')).then(html => assert.equal(html.length, 5)));

tests.name: should grab inner html from within an iframe
should grab browser logs
should grab browser logs across pages
Drag item from source to target (no iframe) @dragNdrop
tests.code: it('Drag item from source to target (no iframe) @dragNdrop', () => I.amOnPage('http://jqueryui.com/resources/demos/droppable/default.html').then(() => I.seeElementInDOM('#draggable')).then(() => I.dragAndDrop('#draggable', '#droppable')).then(() => I.see('Dropped')));

tests.name: Drag and drop from within an iframe
tests.code: it('Drag and drop from within an iframe', () => I.amOnPage('http://jqueryui.com/droppable').then(() => I.resizeWindow(700, 700)).then(() => I.switchTo('//iframe[@class="demo-frame"]')).then(() => I.seeElementInDOM('#draggable')).then(() => I.dragAndDrop('#draggable', '#droppable')).then(() => I.see('Dropped')));

tests.name: should switch to frame using name
tests.code: it('should switch to frame using name', () => I.amOnPage('/iframe').then(() => I.see('Iframe test', 'h1')).then(() => I.dontSee('Information', 'h1')).then(() => I.switchTo('iframe')).then(() => I.see('Information', 'h1')).then(() => I.dontSee('Iframe test', 'h1')));

tests.name: should switch to root frame
tests.code: it('should switch to root frame', () => I.amOnPage('/iframe').then(() => I.see('Iframe test', 'h1')).then(() => I.dontSee('Information', 'h1')).then(() => I.switchTo('iframe')).then(() => I.see('Information', 'h1')).then(() => I.dontSee('Iframe test', 'h1')).then(() => I.switchTo()).then(() => I.see('Iframe test', 'h1')));

tests.name: should switch to frame using frame number
tests.code: it('should switch to frame using frame number', () => I.amOnPage('/iframe').then(() => I.see('Iframe test', 'h1')).then(() => I.dontSee('Information', 'h1')).then(() => I.switchTo(0)).then(() => I.see('Information', 'h1')).then(() => I.dontSee('Iframe test', 'h1')));
